name: Ring A Head
description:
As a small bell-head, you must find the way to get out from the dark room.

The only evidence of the pitiful bell-head is it's own ringing sound, so it must keep moving and make sound so it would not vanish into the darkness.

Move with right/left arrows or A/D and jump with up arrow or W. Find platforms by the bell-head's ringing sound and reach the door. Bell item will give you extra time for ringing. Good luck!

* Made as a team of 3

* Here is our source code -> https://github.com/Connor-Wapi/ShakeAHead

* Music by Michael Vignola, from artlist.io (Royalty free music)  https://artlist.io/artist/493/michael-vignola
